Package com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.delpsservice

The Intelligence Analysis Platform DELPS service provides clients with the ability to interact with data load ELP stage solutions.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IDelpsService A set of methods for interacting with an Intelligence Analysis Platform DELPS (data load ELP stage) solution, including the ability to synchronize Items in the ELP stage with changing data in an external source.
 

Class Summary
ElpStageUnavailableException.Fault Contains information about the enclosing ElpStageUnavailableException.
 

Exception Summary
ElpStageUnavailableException The exception raised when the DELPS service detects that an ELP stage is not responding to messages.
 

Package com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.delpsservice Description

The Intelligence Analysis Platform DELPS service provides clients with the ability to interact with data load ELP stage solutions.

The operations supported by the DELPS service are:

Web methodDescription
CreateOrReplaceItems Adds or replaces items in the item store of a specified ELP stage.
CreateOrReplaceItemsXml Creates items from platform-compatible XML, and then adds or replaces them in the item store of a specified ELP stage.
DeleteItems Deletes items with specified keys from the item store of a specified ELP stage.
PurgeItems Purges items with specified keys from the item store of a specified ELP stage.

Since:
5.0
